name: Edina Unleashed
description:
A short level where you play as a high schooler who is trying to get his chewing tobacco back from his gym teacher, who confiscated it. 

Move with WASD, E is melee attack (punch), Q is ranged attack (energy blast). Burgers regain health, the red gas canisters will equip and can be used to cause an explosion with Shift. 

There are four basic types of enemies: one is a stationary ranged mage, another is a melee enemy that chases on sight, a mini boss that can stomp, and the final boss that can explode the ground. 

There are 4 cut scenes, two required mini bosses, two optional mini bosses and one final boss.  There is also a hidden Easter egg image. 

Made with Daz3D and Unreal Engine 4.25 using Blueprints. I can't make it available for download because there is a copyright chewing tobacco logo in it as well as copyrighted music, but it does represent a finished project :)
